## Documentation Checklist
- [ ] I reviewed `docs/DOC_UPDATE_CHECKLIST.md`.
- [ ] I updated `docs/master-engineering.md` if behavior/plan/status changed.
- [ ] I updated `readme.md` if setup or operator behavior changed.

- [ ] I added an entry to `docs/CHANGELOG_ENGINEERING.md`.
- [ ] I confirmed Ollama endpoint precedence docs are consistent (custom -> configured -> default local).
- [ ] I confirmed DB primary/fallback behavior docs are consistent where applicable.
